about_the_game:
The ultimate DLC for survival game modes!

+15 Shards

Use Shards to unlock weapons, character items, dinosaurs, and more.

+31 Survival Support Items

Automatically receive new support items in future updates.
  • Quad Bike
  • Growler
  • MRAP
  • LAV-25
  • T-90
  • M1 Abrams
  • Ammo Airdrop
  • Weapon Airdrop
  • Heavy Airdrop
  • Support Airdrop
  • Escort Airdrop
  • Sentry Gun
  • Shotgun Turret
  • SAM Turret
  • Flamethrower Turret
  • Grenade Turret
  • Sniper Turret
  • Railgun Turret
  • M2 Browning
  • BGM-71 TOW
  • M242 25mm
  • Compy Egg
  • Dilophosaurus Egg
  • Velociraptor Egg
  • Needlesaurus Egg
  • Allosaurus Egg
  • Spinosaurus Egg
  • AH-1 Cobra
  • OH-58D Kiowa
  • AH-64 Apache
  • UH-60 Blackhawk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: Survival Bundle with 15 Shards and 31 Support Items!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian, Polish, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
